name: Total Stock Balances Value
query:
select  
 tabItem.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:60",
 (select barcode from `tabItem Barcode` where parent = tabItem.item_code) as "Barcode:Data:130",
 tabItem.item_name as "Item Name:Data:300",
 tabItem.item_group as "Item Group:Data:120",
 (select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.actual_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "قطعة:Float:100",
 IFNULL(((select sum(tabBin.actual_qty) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code)/(select conversion_factor from `tabUOM Conversion Detail` where uom = 'علبه' and parent = tabItem.item_code)),0) as "علبة:Float:100",
 IFNULL(((select sum(tabBin.actual_qty) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code)/(select conversion_factor from `tabUOM Conversion Detail` where uom = 'كرتونه' and parent = tabItem.item_code)),0) as "كرتونة:Float:100",
 (select IFNULL(max(tabBin.valuation_rate),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "Value:Float:120",
((select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.actual_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) *(select IFNULL(avg(tabBin.valuation_rate),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code)) as "Total Value:Float:120",
 (select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.reserved_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "Reserved Qty:Float:120",
 (select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.ordered_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "Ordered Qty:Float:120",
 (select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.indented_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "Requested Qty:Float:120",
 (select IFNULL(sum(tabBin.projected_qty),0) from `tabBin` where tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code) as "Projected Qty:Float:120"
from
tabItem
where
tabItem.has_variants = 0
